The beauty went to the aunt, but Anna Pav- lovna detained Pierre, looking as if she had to give some final necessary instructions. 
"Isn't she exquisite?" she said to Pierre, pointing to the stately beauty as she glided a- way."And how she carries herself! Forso young a girl, such tact, such masterly perfection of manner!
